meanings.sent1: Her school projects were always creative and well thought out.
meanings.sent2: The construction projects in the city are improving the infrastructure.
meanings.sent3: The projects to build a treehouse turned into a hilarious mess.
meanings.sent4: His ambitious project to climb Mount Everest seemed impossible at first.
meanings.sent5: The science fair project on volcanoes was both educational and fun.

meanings.sent1: Their joint projects in art class resulted in beautiful paintings.
meanings.sent2: The business projects of the company were successful due to teamwork.
meanings.sent3: The baking project with her friend turned into a delicious competition.
meanings.sent4: Their project to clean up the park together was a great bonding experience.
meanings.sent5: The group project on space exploration was both challenging and rewarding.

meanings.sent1: She projects her voice well during public speaking.
meanings.sent2: The movie screen projects images for everyone to see.
meanings.sent3: He projects his enthusiasm for soccer onto his friends.
meanings.sent4: The lighthouse projects light far out into the sea to guide ships.
meanings.sent5: The teacher projects positivity to motivate her students.
